website_summaries.verdict: Surprise your guests with these relaxing, vegan-friendly party favors.
pros: Handcrafted bath bombs come in a variety of scents: jasmine, mint, rose, cherry, and chamomile
Vegan formula is calming and hydrating
Leaves no oily residue in the tub
cons: Bath bombs are on the smaller side

customer_reviews.title: Good value and nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with these bath bombs. The box contained twelve individually wrapped bath bombs. The box is nice and this would make for a good gift. We have used three so far and like the scents of all three we tried. They had a nice scent that wasn’t overly strong. They are slightly smaller than the largest bath bombs we’ve used before. These dissolve slower than others we’ve used, which I personally think is a positive. Also liked that there was no oily residue In bathtub or on my skin after using. Overall I think this product provide a lot of value with the price and we plan on reordering once we’ve used them all.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a really great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set when I wanted to get a nice big pack of bath bombs to gift to friends. The product arrived in perfect condition and is really well packed. I kept a bunch and wrapped a few couples of bath bombs for my friends birthdays! I used one last night and it was great and dissolved into a lovely scent that was super relaxing. I will definitely order myself another set once I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set of bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the set of a dozen bath bombs and they are not tiny either. They come in six different scents, and each individually wrapped to preserve the scent. I love that it comes in a beautiful gift box that is gift worthy. I've enjoyed using these bath bombs. The scents are all classic scents, that remind me of fresh flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Geetha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Smells great. Love that there is 2 of every scent so you can share or if you like one scent there is always another one you can use next time. It comes packaged so well. Its in a box with a divider and each bath bomb is wrapped in plastic then paper with the scent
customer_reviews.author: Amanda & Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Love it 🛁🛁🧖🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much really happy where is my order show up on time fast and while paked. Great sat. Many different options available in one package beautiful colors talked separately was small labels on each bathboms
customer_reviews.author: Adesignstore

customer_reviews.title: smalll, yet smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs were little smaller than the ones I have used before but they smell heavenly and feels luxurious. They came in a beautiful pink box, which is perfect for gifting. I have tried a couple of different scents and so far I have liked them all.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute fuzzy bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband really loved these bath bombs! The packaging is perfect for gifts on any occasion. We love bath bombs as much as our daughter loves, compared to other we have bought this one is pretty amazing than others as it offers different varieties in one box. We love the white one but our daughter loves the pink. It’s also a great deal if you love both bombs as much as we are because the price is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift, smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this set to give as a gift but after receiving it I decided to be a little selfish and keep it. It smells so good, has six different scents and two of each one. After taking a bath with them my skin felt so soft and smelled great! Now I need to buy at least one more to give as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: shelli bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Varieties of flavor and smell
customer_reviews.text: The pack is well designed and the smell of each flavor is extraordinary. It’s perfect to take a relaxed bath. I liked its varieties the most
customer_reviews.author: anuj

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful. These are really lovely. They smell great and have nice ingredients. The packaging is impressive too. So these would make a great gift for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Connor McKay

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these. I bought a different brand a couple of weeks ago, and there was NO fizz 😭. I bought these the other day, and not only do they smell divine, there’s FIZZ!!! All natural products and I do not have an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ford

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Makes a nice gift. This looks much better than the ones Ive seen at department stores. Packaged beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I liked these a lot, not too big, light soapy scent and pretty presentation. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Quiningseven

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath bombs!
customer_reviews.text: The package is so pretty! Really recommended or buying as a gift for friends! The smell is nice and I really enjoy it! It has individual package (plastic wrap), so it is hygiene and no need to worry about the bath bomb gets moist before usage.
customer_reviews.author: Xxx

customer_reviews.title: It smells heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bath bombs. My skin feels super super soft after use. I love the fragrance of all. I am going to order more for my friends to gift them.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for a gift. I actually used one myself to test it out, good product, smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Gurhan

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: The package is elegant and the soap smells good! Recommend as a nice gift!
customer_reviews.author: Yuanzhuo Liu

customer_reviews.title: These smell wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These smell wonderful and it is a big box!!!! WE LOVE bath bombs - perhaps a bit too much in the fall and winter when cool evenings make baths feel amazing. We've only used one so far, but it didn't leave our skin feeling irritated, and there is nothing that makes me too worried in here. All in all these are good bath bombs, and a HUGE pack for the money. Also great options for teachers' gifts, etc. Always nice to get them something they will use vs another coffee mug. A bath bomb and a small coffee gift card is often what we give to teachers. They seem to always love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling and moisturizing small bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of 12 small bath bombs - 2 bath bombs each for the 6 scents i.e. lavender, jasmine, mint, rose, cherry blossoms and camomile. The bath bombs are pastel colors and smell wonderful. They fizz ok in the bath water, and the skin does feel soft and silky after soaking in it. Each bath bomb is wrapped in plastic to maintain ‘freshness’ and then further wrapped in thin pretty paper. Finally, the bath bombs are contained in a pretty and pink partitioned box.
customer_reviews.author: NWMTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I love that these are made with natural ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about these bath bombs is that they are made with natural shea and coco butter. So after you bathe with them your skin feels baby soft. Your skin will feel so renewed and rejuvenated. They smell absolutely wonderful as well, and your skin keep the wonderful scent for the rest of the day. This set makes a wonderful gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Brosco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift for anyone. Fragrance are amazing. Come in very beautiful packaging. And best guft somebody can get. Beautiful arrangement of bath bombs and selection of different fragrances. It looks beautiful that you do not want to use them even. But ofcourse hv to use. I am going to use it soon and will update the review aftrr using.
customer_reviews.author: tamanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs smell great! They came packaged really well and would make a great gift for anyone. They are extremely fizzy and last a while for their size. I was surprised at how beautifully packaged this came. I am hoping to buy more as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to give these to my cousin for her birthday. The smell and look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very nice packaging and smells beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I bought these in 2019 as a Christmas gift for my daughter (13) and my niece (9) and they loved them so much I purchased them again for Christmas 2020. The packaging is beautiful! Looks very nice! And smell so good! I truly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Steele

customer_reviews.title: Bath Bomb, NOT!!
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this bath bomb is that it didn't dissolve or crumble quickly. With that said, there was no fragrance, not much fizzing and it's very small. This was a cheap purchase and you get what you pay for. My bath tome was far from being the bomb more like bath boring!!
customer_reviews.author: LUCY S.

customer_reviews.title: Hey Guys take a look
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them so need to say more. Gentlemen...want a get out jail card? These work wonders and I believe you will get more bang for the buck than flowers. So get it right Wine, chocolate and bath bombs! Maybe add a candle in the bathroom. Done deal...fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift. I have not given it to the person yetzz
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Missing.  Has not been delivered
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered to wrong address, but now have the item. As described, perfect gift for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

💗Made with finest non-GMO gluten free Shea/cocoa butters, sunflower oil, sea salts & essential oils
